translations: 髓鞘脱失，[病理] 脱髓鞘

sentences.sentence: Demyelination of white matter fibers caused by arteriopathy is one of the major causes of leukoaraiosis.
sentences.translation: 小动脉病变导致的白质纤维脱髓鞘是发生白质疏松的主要原因之一。

sentences.sentence: In our case, the thin peripheral rim of restricted diffusion may represent an active edge of demyelination.
sentences.translation: 在我们的病例中，周边的弥散受限的薄壁环状影可能代表脱髓鞘病变的活动性边缘。

sentences.sentence: Reactive oxygen species (ROS) are mediators of demyelination and disruption of the blood-brain barrier (BBB).
sentences.translation: 活性氧簇(ROS)是神经系统脱髓鞘及血脑屏障破坏的媒介。
